comment: /**  * Return a bound bean instance or {@code null} if the {@link BeanBinder} does not  * support the specified {@link Bindable}.  * @param name the name being bound  * @param target the bindable to bind  * @param context the bind context  * @param propertyBinder property binder  * @param <T> the source type  * @return a bound instance or {@code null}  */
code: /**  * Return a bound bean instance or {@code null} if the {@link BeanBinder} does not  * support the specified {@link Bindable}.  * @param name the name being bound  * @param target the bindable to bind  * @param context the bind context  * @param propertyBinder property binder  * @param <T> the source type  * @return a bound instance or {@code null}  */ <T> T bind(ConfigurationPropertyName name, Bindable<T> target, Context context, BeanPropertyBinder propertyBinder).
